body.name: Educational Toys Building Blocks, 244 Pieces Electric Screwdriver DIY Building Toys for Boys and Girls, Educational Construction Building kit for Kids Ages 4 5 6 7 8 9 10 Year Old
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 50 mins
features: More fun for kids: This building block comes with 244 pieces that include many blocks nuts & bolts, wheels, and funning interchangeable electric screwdriver (requires 2 AA batteries, not included). Your kids can use the electric screwdriver assembling the plates onto the base grid to build 3D and 2D crafts like a lion, truck, butterfly, flowers, bird, helicopter, etc. Kids learn colors and shapes while playing, develop their creativity and mind in new ways.

Creativity & Imagination Educational Toys: The creative toys for kids at family activities, classroom, etc. By playing with these building toys, children can obtain a strong sense of color, hand-eye coordination, engineering design & logical thinking, 2D&3D forms geometrical shapes. Perfect presents for kids 4 5 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 years old.

Develop multiple skills: Color and shape recognition, creativity and imagination, motor skills, manipulative ability, thinking and problem-solving ability, building, and design ability are developed while playing.

Safe and durable: Made of non-toxic and durable ABS plastic, food-grade material; smooth edge of each tile will never hurt baby's little hands, harmless to human and environment, meets toy safety standards.

Easy clean-up and storage: The building toys can be washed with running water and mild soap due to their superior plastic material; The large-capacity storage case come with a bonus storage bag to store all those pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the perfect gift for a little boy or girl!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set for my stepgrandson and he absolutely loved it! From my perspective, it's educational, good quality, and a lot of fun. My stepgrandson spent a good amount of time playing with it. He especially loved the drill. I highly recommend this toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect hand eye learning
reviews.reviewText: Great toy! A lot of pieces but it comes with a bag and case to keep it all in. This can keep a kid busy for hours! I found this when I was looking specifically for hand eye toys and this is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Engaging, colorful, and different levels of play.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toy for my 3 (nearly 4) year old daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves it. It does have small pieces that a child will need to be old enough to know not to put in their mouth, and also how to keep them contained and not lose them. The pieces all fit inside the box provided; but we ended up using a Tupperware box with a lid, and I added my own cardboard dividers to keep the pieces separate as opposed to using the carrying box, so it doesn’t have to be continuously opened or otherwise dumped out to be played with. It features different difficulty levels of play with the easiest being the paper pictures with holes and the button type push ins; a level up would be working with screws and tools, and then attempting to build flat 2D pictures with the shapes on a blank background, or using the booklet provided to build 3D creations being the most difficult. The toy doesn’t come with enough nuts for all the screws and I think it should have more of these both. Otherwise my daughter wants to play with it all the time. She packs it up to take to her papa’s house and enjoys making different patterns on the board. By far her favorite gift; she even likes it better than her dollhouse I got her the year prior.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Educational and easy to play with
reviews.reviewText: I love that my two and four year old can play with this toy. It helps them to use their imagination as well as learning their colors. I'm satisfied with this purchase. I will recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great exploratory toy
reviews.reviewText: Nice toy for children to learn and explore. Only real issue, is the case doesn't hold all the pieces in the bag without kind of crushing it in. If the case was a little wider it would be perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My young kids were fighting over this!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my three year old for Christmas, but my older kids were fighting to play with it. It kept them entertained for hours and they loved the little play drill that actually worked. This would make a great gift for ages 3-7. Great quality and great customer service. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for learning
reviews.reviewText: This 244 piece electric screwdriver kit is Terrific. My grandson spends hours screwing pieces onto the case it comes with. Everything fits inside the case when finished. We put the pieces in a bowl and let him built on the case. It has holes the screws fit into. He loves the electric "battery operated" screwdriver. He can now change the manual screwdriver from Phillips to a straight head or a nut driver. This has been great for his fine motor skills. Thanks for such a great toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great learning toy
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves this building set! I was very impressed with the whole set up. He started building things right away and loves using the drill! Going to buy another one for my other grandson.
My son loves using his tools and joining daddy in the workshop to build things with "his tools" . Great quality!

I bought this for my 4 year old nephew for Christmas, all reports back are that he loves playing with it!I have a hard time buying toys for kids, as a practical gift giver, but this one checked the practical boxes. It works on hand eye coordination, fine motor skills, creativity and confidence growth. For a boy who loves to do it himself and work with tools, this gift beat all others.I would have purchased it for my daughter if she was younger too.

I purchased this a while back ago and I couldn't be happier! This innovative set not only entertained my child for hours but also sparked their creativity and problem-solving skills. The electric screwdriver added an exciting twist, making the building process both fun and educational. I highly recommend this engaging and enriching toy for parents looking to foster their child's learning through play!!

My son LOVED this gift! The basic designs are super easy for him to play around with only being 5yrs old. I did notice the age limit starts at 3+ which I don’t find fitting for the more complex designs. But it definitely is a toy that I think will be around for a very long time in my household!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality, my Nephew loves it!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toy, my nephew loves it! And he loves the tools and can’t stop playing with it. It’s great for his coordination and creativity. We also received excellent support from the seller ensuring our experience was all good. Would order from here again any time!
